<A NAME="NIHD-12312015X10KXEX1032_HTM_S8D0449477E5D4014AE9A1E9D0D8E6127">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	20.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Validity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If any provision of this Agreement or the application of any provision hereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, unenforceable or otherwise illegal, the remainder of this Agreement and the application of such provision to any other person or circumstance shall not be affected, and the provision so held to be invalid, unenforceable or otherwise illegal shall be reformed to the extent, and only to the extent, necessary to make it enforceable, valid or legal. In the event that any court or other adjudicative body shall decline to reform any provision of this Agreement held to be invalid, unenforceable or otherwise illegal as contemplated by the immediately preceding sentence, the parties thereto shall take all such action as may be necessary or appropriate to replace the provision so held to be invalid, unenforceable or otherwise illegal with one or more alternative provisions that effectuate the purpose and intent of the original provisions of this Agreement as fully as possible without being invalid, unenforceable or otherwise illegal.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	21.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Miscellaneous
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. No provision of this Agreement may be waived, modified or discharged unless such waiver, modification or discharge is agreed to in writing signed by Indemnitee and the Company. No waiver by either party hereto at any time of any breach by the other party hereto or compliance with any condition or provision of this Agreement to be performed by such other party shall be deemed a waiver of similar or dissimilar provisions or conditions at the same or at any prior or subsequent time. No agreements or representations, oral or otherwise, expressed or implied with respect to the subject matter hereof have been made by either party that are not set forth expressly in this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage168"></A>
<A NAME="NIHD-12312015X10KXEX1032_HTM_S8D0449477E5D4014AE9A1E9D0D8E6127">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	22.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Legal Fees and Expenses; Interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. (a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	It is the intent of the Company that Indemnitee not be required to incur legal fees and or other Expenses associated with the interpretation, enforcement or defense of Indemnitee&#8217;s rights under this Agreement by litigation or otherwise because the cost and expense thereof would substantially detract from the benefits intended to be extended to Indemnitee hereunder. Accordingly, without limiting the generality or effect of any other provision hereof, if it should appear to Indemnitee that the Company has failed to comply with any of its obligations under this Agreement (including its obligations under Section 4) or in the event that the Company or any other person takes or threatens to take any action to declare this Agreement void or unenforceable, or institutes any litigation or other action or proceeding designed to deny, or to recover from, Indemnitee the benefits provided or intended to be provided to Indemnitee hereunder, the Company irrevocably authorizes Indemnitee from time to time to retain counsel of Indemnitee&#8217;s choice, at the expense of the Company as hereafter provided, to advise and represent Indemnitee in connection with any such interpretation, enforcement or defense, including the initiation or defense of any litigation or other legal action, whether by or against the Company or any director, officer, stockholder or other person affiliated with the Company, in any jurisdiction. Notwithstanding any existing or prior attorney-client relationship between the Company and such counsel, the Company irrevocably consents to Indemnitee&#8217;s entering into an attorney-client relationship with such counsel, and in that connection the Company and Indemnitee agree that a confidential relationship shall exist between Indemnitee and such counsel. The Company will pay and be solely financially responsible for any and all attorneys&#8217; and related fees and expenses incurred by Indemnitee in connection with any of the foregoing to the fullest extent permitted or required by the laws of the State of Delaware in effect on the date hereof or as such laws may from time to time hereafter be amended to increase the scope of such permitted or required payment of such fees and expenses.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any amount due to Indemnitee under this Agreement that is not paid by the Company by the date on which it is due will accrue interest at the prime rate as announced by Citibank, N.A. plus 5% or if less, the maximum legal rate under Delaware law, from the date on which such amount is due to the date on which such amount is paid to Indemnitee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	23.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Certain Interpretive Matters
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Unless the context of this Agreement otherwise requires, (a)&#160;&#8220;it&#8221; or &#8220;its&#8221; or words of any gender include each other gender, (b)&#160;words using the singular or plural number also include the plural or singular number, respectively, (c)&#160;the terms &#8220;hereof,&#8221; &#8220;herein,&#8221; &#8220;hereby&#8221; and derivative or similar words refer to this entire Agreement, (d)&#160;the terms &#8220; &#8220;Section&#8221; or &#8220;Exhibit&#8221; refer to the specified Section or Exhibit of or to this Agreement, (e)&#160;the terms &#8220;include,&#8221; &#8220;includes&#8221; and &#8220;including&#8221; will be deemed to be followed by the words &#8220;without limitation&#8221; (whether or not so expressed), and (f)&#160;the word &#8220;or&#8221; is disjunctive but not exclusive. Whenever this Agreement refers to a number of days, such number will refer to calendar days unless business days are specified and whenever action must be taken (including the giving of notice or the delivery of documents) under this Agreement during a certain period of time or by a particular date that ends or occurs on a non-business day, then such period or date will be extended until the immediately following business day. As used herein, &#8220;business day&#8221; means any day other than Saturday, Sunday or a United States federal holiday.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	24.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Counterparts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which will be deemed to be an original but all of which together shall constitute one and the same agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">

	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The undersigned hereby requests [payment], [advancement], [reimbursement] by the Company of Expenses which the undersigned [has incurred] [reasonably expects to incur] in connection with ______________________ (the &#8220;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 10.37
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;MARGIN-LEFT:AUTO;MARGIN-RIGHT:AUTO;WIDTH:95.8984375%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="2">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="49%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONTRATO DE TRABALHO
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Pelo presente Contrato de Trabalho, doravante denominado &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Contrato
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;,

	Company

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;, now, then, in consideration of the mutual covenants and promises set forth herein, the Parties hereto agree as follows:

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1. SERVI&#199;OS E PER&#205;ODO DE EXPERI&#202;NCIA
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1. Services AND PROBATION PERIOD
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.1 O Empregado dever&#225; prestar servi&#231;os &#224; Empresa no cargo de Presidente e Representante Legal na fun&#231;&#227;o de Administrador indicado nos respectivos aditamentos dos contratos sociais da Empresa e suas subsidi&#225;rias e o estatuto social da sua empresa controladora (Nextel SA).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.1 The Employee undertakes to render services to Company in the position of President and Legal Representative in the role of Administrator appointed in the relevant amendments to the articles of incorporation of the Company and its subsidiaries and the bylaws of its controlling company (Nextel SA).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_68"></A>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.2 Os servi&#231;os ser&#227;o prestados na sede da Empresa ou em quaisquer outros locais em que a Empresa tenha interesses negociais. A Empresa poder&#225; transferir o Empregado para qualquer localidade dentro do Brasil, a t&#237;tulo tempor&#225;rio ou permanente. Sempre que necess&#225;rio, o Empregado realizar&#225; viagens a servi&#231;o da Empresa, cujas despesas lhe ser&#227;o reembolsadas, mediante apresenta&#231;&#227;o dos comprovantes.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.2 The services shall be rendered at the Company&#8217;s headquarters or at any other place where the Company may carry on business. The Company is allowed to transfer the Employee to any other location within Brazil, temporarily or definitively. Whenever necessary, Employee shall travel as instructed by the Company with expenses being reimbursed, upon the presentation of receipts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

	&#8221;) ou seu sucessor.

Whenever required, the Employee shall report and account to Steven Shindler, Chief Executive Officer of NII Holdings, Inc. (&#8220;

</FONT>
</DIV>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_71"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Em raz&#227;o da sua posi&#231;&#227;o e poderes de gest&#227;o, o Empregado n&#227;o estar&#225; sujeito a uma jornada de trabalho fixa, nem tampouco far&#225; jus ao recebimento de adicional por horas extras, uma vez que exerce cargo de confian&#231;a, nos termos do artigo 62, inciso II, da Consolida&#231;&#227;o das Leis do Trabalho.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In view of his position and his management powers, the Employee will not be subject to a fixed work shift neither will he be entitled to receive any additional payment for overtime work, as he renders services on a bona fide basis, according to Article 62, subsection II, of the Brazilian Labor Law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Na vig&#234;ncia deste Contrato, a Empresa pagar&#225; ao Empregado o sal&#225;rio fixo mensal bruto de R$184.615,38 (cento e oitenta e quatro mil e seiscentos e quinze reais e trinta e oito centavos).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	During the term of this Agreement, the Company shall pay the Employee the fixed monthly gross salary of R$184,615.38 (one hundred eighty four thousand, six hundred fifteen reais and thirty eight cents).
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_75"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	O Empregado far&#225; jus a um B&#244;nus Anual de at&#233; R$4.800.000,00 (quatro milh&#245;es e oitocentos mil reais), composto da seguinte forma: (i) R$600.000,00 (seiscentos mil reais) pagos mediante submiss&#227;o do plano de neg&#243;cio da Empresa ao Conselho de Administra&#231;&#227;o da NII; (ii) R$600.000,00 (seiscentos mil reais) pago mediante aceita&#231;&#227;o do plano de neg&#243;cio da Empresa pelo Conselho de Administra&#231;&#227;o da NII (o plano de neg&#243;cio aceito, o &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Plano
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), que &#233; parte integrante deste Contrato e; (iii) Pagamentos trimestrais de at&#233; R$1.200.000,00 (um milh&#227;o e duzentos mil reais), a partir do primeiro trimestre de 2016, devidos caso as metas m&#237;nimas especificadas para cada trimestre sejam atingidas. As Partes reconhecem e concordam que as m&#233;tricas e metas espec&#237;ficas de desempenho do Empregado para cada trimestre ser&#227;o definidas pelo Comit&#234; de Remunera&#231;&#227;o do Conselho de Diretores da NII baseadas no Plano e o pagamento para cada trimestre est&#225; condicionado ao atingimento m&#237;nimo de todos os alvos das m&#233;tricas de desempenho e sujeito &#224; aprova&#231;&#227;o pelo Comit&#234; de Remunera&#231;&#227;o do Conselho de Diretores da NII. Todos os valores aqui indicados s&#227;o brutos.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The Employee will be entitled to an Annual Bonus up to R$4,800,000 (four million, eight hundred thousand reais), comprised as follows: (i) R$600,000 (six hundred thousand reais) paid upon submission of the Company&#8217;s business plan to the Board of Directors of NII; (ii) R$600,000 (six hundred thousand reais) paid upon acceptance of the Company&#8217;s business plan by the Board of Directors of NII (the accepted business plan, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), which is an integral part of this Agreement; and (iii) quarterly payments of up to R$1,200,000 (one million, two hundred thousand reais) each fiscal quarter, starting with the first quarter of 2016, if specified minimum quarterly targets are achieved. The Parties acknowledge and agree that the Employee&#8217;s specific performance measures and targets for each quarter will be set by the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors of NII based on the Plan, and the payment for each quarter is contingent on achieving minimum thresholds for all performance measures and subject to approval by the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors of NII. All amounts herein are gross.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5. CONCESS&#195;O DE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	EQUITY
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5. EQUITY GRANT
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	O Empregado receber&#225; uma concess&#227;o de
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	equity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;de longo prazo da NII equivalente a US$3.000,000 (tr&#234;s milh&#245;es de d&#243;lares), divididos igualmente entre
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	restricted common stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;e op&#231;&#227;o de compra de a&#231;&#245;es (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	common stock option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	) da NII, as quais ser&#227;o concedidas sob condi&#231;&#227;o suspensiva no segundo dia &#250;til ap&#243;s a publica&#231;&#227;o das demonstra&#231;&#245;es financeiras da NII do terceiro trimestre de 2015 e ser&#227;o plenamente adquiridas anualmente em partes iguais nos primeiros 3 (tr&#234;s) anivers&#225;rios da data de concess&#227;o. O n&#250;mero de a&#231;&#245;es, op&#231;&#245;es e pre&#231;o ser&#227;o baseados no pre&#231;o de fechamento da a&#231;&#227;o ordin&#225;ria da NII na data de concess&#227;o. Os detalhes e condi&#231;&#245;es de
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	restricted stocks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	stock options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;ser&#227;o estabelecidos pela NII por meio do acordo de concess&#227;o de a&#231;&#245;es,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	os quais s&#227;o expressamente definidos e aprovados pelo Conselho de Administra&#231;&#227;o da NII (o &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Restricted Stock Award Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221; e &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Nonqualified Stock Option Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8221;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	e conforme o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Plano de Remunera&#231;&#227;o de Incentivo da NII 2015 (o &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Incentive Compensation Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), cada um parte integrante deste Contrato.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The Employee will receive a long-term grant of equity of NII equal to US$3,000,000 (three million US dollars) split equally between restricted common stock of NII and options to purchase common stock of NII, which will be granted under condition on the second business day after the release of the third quarter 2015 financial statements for NII and which will vest in equal parts on the first three (3) anniversaries of the date of grant. The number of shares, options and strike price will be based on the closing price of NII&#8217;s common stock on the date of grant. The details and conditions for restricted stock and stock options will be established by NII through equity award agreements, expressly defined and approved by the Board of Directors of NII (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Restricted Stock Award Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221; and &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Nonqualified Stock Option Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8221;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	and pursuant to the NII 2015 Incentive Compensation Plan (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	2015 Incentive Compensation Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), each an integral part of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_78"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Durante a vig&#234;ncia deste Contrato, o Empregado ter&#225; direito aos benef&#237;cios garantidos por lei e aos seguintes:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a) Assist&#234;ncia M&#233;dica Omint, n&#237;vel executivo e com op&#231;&#227;o de livre escolha;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b) Assist&#234;ncia Odontol&#243;gica Odontoprev, com rede credenciada e op&#231;&#227;o de livre escolha;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c) Seguro de vida em grupo com cobertura de 24 sal&#225;rios base em caso de morte natural e 48 sal&#225;rios base por morte acidental, at&#233; o limite de R$2.600.000,00 (dois milh&#245;es e seiscentos mil reais);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d) Vale refei&#231;&#227;o ou alimenta&#231;&#227;o no valor de R$26,65 (vinte e seis reais e sessenta e cinco centavos), por dia &#250;til de cada m&#234;s;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(e) Plano de previd&#234;ncia privada com contribui&#231;&#227;o da Empresa no mesmo percentual da contribui&#231;&#227;o do participante, limitada a 10% do sal&#225;rio nominal;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(f) Carro da Empresa at&#233; o limite de R$400.000,00 (quatrocentos mil reais), consistindo em um ve&#237;culo blindado, sendo que o fabricante e modelo espec&#237;ficos ser&#227;o determinados pelos ve&#237;culos dispon&#237;veis, com todas as despesas pagas pela Empresa;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_79"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(g) Estacionamento gratuito; e
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(h) Telefone celular com despesas pagas pela Empresa e 3 (tr&#234;s) celulares adicionais para membros da fam&#237;lia.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	During the term of this Agreement, the Employee will be entitled to the statutory benefits and the following ones:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a) Health Plan Omint, executive level and free choice option;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b) Dental Plan Odontoprev, with credential net and free choice option;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c) Group life insurance with coverage of 24 base salaries in case of natural death and 48 base salaries for accidental death, capped at R$2,600,000 (two million, six hundred thousand reais);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d) Meal or food allowance in the amount of R$26.65 (twenty six reais and sixty five cents), per business day of each month;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(e) Private Pension Plan with the Company&#8217;s contribution at the same percentage as the participant&#8217;s contribution, capped at 10% of the base salary;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(f) Company vehicle in the maximum amount of R$400,000.00 (four hundred thousand reais), consisting of a bullet-proof vehicle, the specific make and model to be determined by the available vehicles, with all expenses borne by the Company;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(g) Free parking; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(h) Cellphone with all expenses borne by the Company and 3 (three) additional phones for family members.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7. PROTE&#199;&#195;O ADICIONAL CONTRA RESCIS&#195;O
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7. ADDITIONAL SEVERANCE PROTECTION
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1 O Empregado ter&#225; direito ao pagamento de uma Prote&#231;&#227;o Adicional contra Rescis&#227;o (a &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rescis&#227;o Adicional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) de at&#233; US$4.500.000,00 (quatro milh&#245;es e quinhentos mil d&#243;lares), nas seguintes hip&#243;teses:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;(1) caso haja uma mudan&#231;a de controle acion&#225;rio da Empresa ou da NII; ou (2) caso haja um neg&#243;cio jur&#237;dico incluindo parceria, sociedade ou MVNO (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Mobile Virtual Network Operator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), resultando na participa&#231;&#227;o societ&#225;ria, direta ou indireta, da NII, de menos de 50% na Empresa (o &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Neg&#243;cio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(B)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;o contrato de trabalho do Empregado com a Empresa for rescindido sem justa causa pela Empresa no per&#237;odo compreendido entre adata de assinatura do contrato definitivo do Neg&#243;cio e 12 (doze) meses ap&#243;s a data do
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	closing (fechamento)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;do Neg&#243;cio (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	os dois eventos A e B em conjunto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1 The Employee will be entitled to the payment of an Additional Severance Protection (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Additional Severance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) up to US$4,500,000 (four million, five hundred thousand US dollars), in the following cases:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;(1) should there be a change of control of the Company or NII, or (2) should there be a transaction, including a partnership or MVNO (Mobile Virtual Network Operator) resulting in NII directly or indirectly owning less than 50% of the outstanding equity interests of the Company (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Transaction
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;(B)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;the employment relationship of the Employee with the Company is terminated for mere convenience by the Company from the time an agreement relating to a Transaction is entered into and 12 (twelve) months following the Transaction closing date (the two events, A and B cumulative).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_80"></A>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_81"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.2 As Partes ora reconhecem e concordam que (i) pedido de demiss&#227;o e demiss&#227;o por justa causa est&#227;o exclu&#237;das dessa Rescis&#227;o Adicional e n&#227;o ser&#225; devido qualquer pagamento a t&#237;tulo de Rescis&#227;o Adicional; e (ii) a Rescis&#227;o Adicional somente ser&#225; devida se exceder o valor obrigat&#243;rio das verbas rescis&#243;rias no Brasil a serem pagas por ocasi&#227;o da rescis&#227;o sem justa causa, sendo que o valor excedente &#224; verbas rescis&#243;rias obrigat&#243;rias no Brasil dever&#225; ser pago em d&#243;lares norte-americanos na conta corrente indicada pelo Empregado.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.2 The Parties acknowledge and agree herein that (i) voluntary termination and termination for cause are excluded from the Additional Severance and will not result in payment of the Additional Severance; and (ii) the Severance Protection will be due and payable only to extent it exceeds the mandated amount of termination fees in Brazil paid by virtue of termination without cause, in which case the amount exceeding the mandated termination fees in Brazil shall be paid in U.S. dollars to an account of the Employee&#8217;s choice.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.3 As Partes reconhecem e concordam ainda que caso a Rescis&#227;o Adicional seja paga, tal Rescis&#227;o Adicional representa uma contrapresta&#231;&#227;o razo&#225;vel e justa para a concord&#226;ncia do Empregado pelas previs&#245;es de n&#227;o-concorr&#234;ncia e n&#227;o-aliciamento conforme descritas na Se&#231;&#227;o 9 durante o per&#237;odo deste Contrato e pelo per&#237;odo de 1 (um) ap&#243;s a sua rescis&#227;o.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.3 The Parties further acknowledge and agree that should the Additional Severance be paid, such Additional Severance represents reasonable and fair consideration for Employee&#8217;s agreements to non-competition and non-solicitation provisions as described in Section 9 during the term of this Agreement and for a period of 1 (one) year thereafter.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8. CONFIDENCIALIDADE
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8. CONFIDENTIALITY
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.1 Durante o per&#237;odo deste Contrato e pelo per&#237;odo de 1 (um) ano ap&#243;s a sua rescis&#227;o, o Empregado se compromete a n&#227;o utilizar, divulgar ou de qualquer outra forma revelar Informa&#231;&#245;es Confidenciais a que venha a ter acesso no desenvolvimento de suas atividades.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.1 During the term of this Agreement and for a period of 1 (one) year thereafter , the Employee shall not use, disclose or otherwise reveal Confidential Information of the Company to which she may have had access as a result of the performance of his activities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_83"></A>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.2 Constituem Informa&#231;&#245;es Confidenciais para os prop&#243;sitos deste Contrato, incluindo, exemplificativamente, listas de empregados e remunera&#231;&#245;es, planos de aquisi&#231;&#227;o, pol&#237;ticas de pre&#231;os, m&#233;todos de trabalho e opera&#231;&#245;es, estrat&#233;gias comerciais, estrat&#233;gias de neg&#243;cios e mercado, planos de propaganda e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	marketing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, segredos comerciais, industriais e de neg&#243;cios, tecnologias,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	know-how
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, f&#243;rmulas, projetos, designs, modelos, desenhos, esbo&#231;os, planos, patentes, t&#233;cnicas de programa&#231;&#227;o de computador, programas de computador, pre&#231;os, listas de fornecedores e de clientes, desempenho, lucro, custos, vendas, relat&#243;rios financeiros, participa&#231;&#245;es de mercado e opera&#231;&#245;es especiais, ou qualquer outra informa&#231;&#227;o confidencial relativa aos neg&#243;cios e opera&#231;&#245;es da Empresa ou de qualquer de suas afiliadas.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.2 Confidential Information, for the purpose of this Agreement, includes, without limitation, employee and employee compensation lists, acquisition plans, pricing policies, working and operational methods, commercial strategies, businesses and market strategies, advertisement and marketing plans, commercial, industrial and business secrets, technologies, know-how, formulas, projects, designs, models, sketches, drafts, plans, patents, computer programming techniques, computer programs, prices, lists of suppliers and clients, performance, profits, costs, sales, financial reports, market share and special operations, or any other confidential information relating to the business and operations of the Company or of any its affiliates.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_84"></A>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_85"></A>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.3 Caso o Empregado venha a ser obrigado por for&#231;a de lei a divulgar quaisquer Informa&#231;&#245;es Confidenciais, dever&#225; imediatamente notificar a Empresa sobre o fato para que este possa, ent&#227;o, deliberar sobre as medidas que julgue necess&#225;rias a fim de: (i) evitar a divulga&#231;&#227;o das Informa&#231;&#245;es Confidenciais; ou (ii) instruir o Empregado sobre o modo como as Informa&#231;&#245;es Confidenciais devem ser divulgadas. O Empregado dever&#225; tomar todas e quaisquer medidas necess&#225;rias para cooperar com a Empresa para manter confidenciais as Informa&#231;&#245;es Confidenciais. As medidas a serem tomadas pelo Empregado incluem, exemplificativamente, o pedido &#224;s autoridades judiciais ou administrativas relevantes do tratamento confidencial das Informa&#231;&#245;es Confidenciais.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.3 In the event that the Employee is requested by virtue of law to disclose any Confidential Information, he must immediately notify the Company about the requested disclosure so that the Company can take any and all measures that its deems necessary to (i) avoid the disclosure of the Confidential Information; or (ii) instruct the Employee as to how the Confidential Information should be disclosed. The Employee must take any and all necessary action to cooperate with the Company to keep confidential the Confidential Information. The actions to be taken by the Employee include, but are not limited to, requesting to the relevant judicial or administrative authorities confidential treatment to the Confidential Information.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_86"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.4 O Empregado dever&#225; restituir, assim que solicitado pela Empresa ou no t&#233;rmino do presente Contrato, todos e quaisquer materiais que contenham Informa&#231;&#245;es Confidenciais.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.4 The Employee must return, upon the request of the Company or the termination of this Agreement, any and all materials containing Confidential Information.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.5 A viola&#231;&#227;o da obriga&#231;&#227;o de confidencialidade implicar&#225; rescis&#227;o por justa causa deste Contrato, sem preju&#237;zo das san&#231;&#245;es penais decorrentes de procedimento criminal e san&#231;&#245;es civis.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.5 The breach of the confidentiality obligation will result in the termination with cause of the Agreement, regardless of criminal penalties arising from a criminal procedure and civil sanctions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9. N&#195;O ALICIAMENTO
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9. NON-SOLICITATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_87"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	N&#227;o-Aliciamento (a empregados e clientes)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Durante o per&#237;odo deste Contrato e 1 (um) ano ap&#243;s a sua rescis&#227;o, (i) em caso de demiss&#227;o sem justa causa do Empregado e (ii) caso n&#227;o haja um Neg&#243;cio, o Empregado est&#225; proibido de: (a) direta ou indiretamente, incentivar um ou mais dos empregados da Empresa a deixar a Empresa e aceitar um emprego em neg&#243;cios concorrentes com a Empresa; ou (b) direta ou indiretamente, incentivar ou ajudar qualquer outra pessoa no sentido de incentivar qualquer conselheiro, diretor, empregado, agente, consultor, contratante independente, ou qualquer outra pessoa afiliada com a Empresa de rescindir ou alterar a sua rela&#231;&#227;o com a Empresa; ou (c) direta ou indiretamente, incentivar um ou mais dos clientes da Empresa para, no todo ou em parte, deixar a Empresa ou transferir o seu neg&#243;cio para uma empresa com neg&#243;cios concorrentes com os da Empresa.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Solicitation (of employees and clients)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. During the term of this Agreement and for a period of 1 (one) year thereafter if (i) the Employee is terminated for mere convenience and (ii) there has been no Transaction, the Employee may not: (a) directly or indirectly, encourage one or more of the Company&#8217;s employees to leave the Company and take employment with a business in competition with the Company; or (b) directly or indirectly, encourage or assist any other person in encouraging any director, officer, employee, agent, consultant, independent contractor, or any other person affiliated with the Company to terminate or alter his/her or its relationship with the Company; or (c) directly or indirectly, encourage one or more of the Company&#8217;s customers to, in whole or partly, leave the Company or transfer their business to a business in competition with the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10. INVEN&#199;&#213;ES E CRIA&#199;&#213;ES
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10. INVENTIONS AND CREATIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_88"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	10.1 Todas e quaisquer inven&#231;&#245;es, descobertas, melhorias, ideias, conceitos, cria&#231;&#245;es ou quaisquer direitos suscet&#237;veis ou n&#227;o a registro perante &#243;rg&#227;os de Propriedade Industrial ou Intelectual no Brasil ou no exterior que o Empregado tenha criado ou realizado, a qualquer tempo, relacionadas a quaisquer atividades executadas por ele em nome da Empresa (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Cria&#231;&#245;es
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) ser&#227;o de total e exclusiva propriedade da Empresa.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	10.1 All and any inventions, discoveries, improvements, ideas, concepts, creations or any rights susceptible or not of registration before Intellectual or Industrial Property Authorities in Brazil or abroad created or performed by the Employee, at any time, related to any activities rendered by him on behalf of the Company (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Creations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) are owned entirely and exclusively by the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_89"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.2 O Empregado dever&#225; transferir &#224; Empresa todos os direitos de propriedade dessas Cria&#231;&#245;es, incluindo direito de autor e de patente, n&#227;o sendo devida qualquer remunera&#231;&#227;o adicional em raz&#227;o da transfer&#234;ncia. O Empregado ainda deve celebrar e assinar todos e quaisquer instrumentos que a Empresa julgar necess&#225;rios para permitir o pedido, a consecu&#231;&#227;o e obten&#231;&#227;o de direitos autorais, patentes e outros direitos de propriedade, ou para transferir para a Empresa todos os direitos, t&#237;tulos ou interesses em tais Cria&#231;&#245;es ou trabalhos pass&#237;veis de prote&#231;&#227;o autoral.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.2 The Employee shall transfer to the Company all rights of property of such Creations, including author and patent rights, not being due any additional remuneration as a consequence of such transfer. The Employee shall also execute all and any documents that the Company considers necessary to allow the request, the achievement and obtaining of author, patent and other property rights, or to transfer to the Company all rights, certificates or interests in such Creations or works likely to have author protection.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">

	11. INTERNAL POLICIES AND REGULATIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_90"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	O Empregado se compromete a cumprir com as pol&#237;ticas internas e regulamentos da Empresa e das empresas do grupo, incluindo, mas n&#227;o se limitando ao C&#243;digo de Conduta e &#201;tica da Empresa e da NII e &#224;s pol&#237;ticas de Anti-Corrup&#231;&#227;o e FCPA , as quais s&#227;o aceitas como parte integrante deste Contrato.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Employee undertakes to comply with the Company&#8217;s and companies&#8217; group internal policies and regulations, including but not limited to the Company&#8217;s and NII&#8217;s Code of Conduct and Ethics and Anti-Corruption and FCPA Compliance Policy, which are hereby accepted as integral part of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12. GENERAL PROVISIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.1 Todos os valores constantes deste Contrato s&#227;o brutos e est&#227;o sujeitos &#224;s dedu&#231;&#245;es fiscais aplic&#225;veis.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.1 All the amounts mentioned in this Agreement are gross and are subject to applicable tax deductions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.2 As cl&#225;usulas deste Contrato s&#227;o independentes entre si. Se alguma disposi&#231;&#227;o deste Contrato estiver em desacordo ou se tornar obsoleta perante a Lei, as outras disposi&#231;&#245;es continuar&#227;o v&#225;lidas.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.2 The clauses of this Agreement are severable. Should any provision of this Agreement not stand or become redundant under the laws, the other provisions shall remain in effect.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.3 Este Contrato constitui o acordo integral entre as Partes e substitui todos os contratos anteriores, escritos ou verbais.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.3 This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties and supersedes all prior agreements, whether in written or verbally.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.4 O foro da cidade de S&#227;o Paulo, Estado de S&#227;o Paulo, ter&#225; jurisdi&#231;&#227;o exclusiva para dirimir quaisquer controv&#233;rsias relativas ao Contrato.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-LEFT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.4 The courts of the city of S&#227;o Paulo, State of S&#227;o Paulo, shall have exclusive jurisdiction to decide any controversies related to the Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>

<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:32PX;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 23.1
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:32PX;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Consent of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Board of Directors and Stockholders
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	NII Holdings, Inc.:&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We consent to the incorporation by reference in the registration statements (No. 333-205259) on Form S-8 and (No. 333-205665) on Form S-1 of NII Holdings, Inc. of our report dated March 3, 2016, with respect to the consolidated balance sheets of NII Holdings, Inc. and&#160;subsidiaries (the Company) as of December&#160;31, 2015 (Successor) and December 31, 2014 (Predecessor), and the related consolidated statements of comprehensive (loss) income, changes in stockholders&#8217; equity (deficit), and cash flows for the six month periods ended December 31, 2015 (Successor) and June 30, 2015 (Predecessor) and for the year ended December 31, 2014 (Predecessor), and the related financial statement schedules, which report appears in the December&#160;31, 2015 annual report on Form 10&#8209;K of the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our report dated March 3, 2016, on the consolidated financial statements, contains an explanatory paragraph that states that the Company is unlikely to satisfy a financial covenant included in Nextel Brazil&#8217;s local bank loans and the existence of cross default provisions included in Nextel Brazil&#8217;s equipment financing facility raise substantial doubt about the Company&#8217;s ability to continue as a going concern. The consolidated financial statements and financial statement schedules do not include any adjustments that might result from the outcome of this uncertainty.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our report dated March 3, 2016, on the consolidated financial statements, contains an explanatory paragraph that states that the consolidated financial statements as of and for the six month period ended December 31, 2015 (Successor) have been prepared in accordance with the Accounting Standards Codification Topic 852,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Reorganizations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Company applied fresh-start reporting as of June 30, 2015 and recognized net assets at fair value, resulting in a lack of comparability with the consolidated financial statements of the Predecessor.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	/s/ KPMG LLP
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	McLean, Virginia
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	March 3, 2016
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>

</FONT>

</TD>

</DIV>
</TD>

	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&#160;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">

	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:42PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:90PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:90PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">

	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">

</TD>

</DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&#160;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:20PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In connection with the Annual Report on Form 10-K for the period ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;(the &#8220;Report&#8221;) of NII Holdings, Inc. and subsidiaries (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), I, Steven M. Shindler, Chief Executive Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167; 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that to my knowledge and belief:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Report fully complies with the requirements of section 13(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
